column2: expect to wait if you're coming during peak eating time periods. The place is pretty small and the line can get pretty long. The ribs here
column3: both baby back and St. Louis are amazing. The brisket is tender and has great flavor. The pulled pork also is really flavorful and has a great texture and smokiness to it. There are also several sauces you can try everything with. I haven't tried many of the sides
column4: but I can tell you that the small serving of fries is almost certainly enough for a single person. A large portion can feed 2-3 people with fries.
